javadoc:
Interface for providing string translating services.

Implementations of this interface are usually done via a Plugin and then registered via {@link Plugin}'s registerServiceProvided().

methods.name: getTranslationServiceName
methods.comment:
Returns the name of this translation service.  Used when building menus to allow
 the user to pick a translation service.

methods.name: getHelpLocation
methods.comment:
Returns the HelpLocation instance that describes where to direct the user
 for help when they hit f1.

methods.name: translate
methods.comment:
Requests this translation service to translate the specified string data instances.
 
 The implementation generally should not block when performing this action.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program containing the data instances.

methods.name: createStringTranslationServiceHelpLocation
methods.comment: Helper that creates a HelpLocation based on the plugin and sts.

params.name: pluginClass
params.comment: Plugin that provides the string translation service

return.comment:
HelpLocation with topic equal to the plugin name and anchor something like
 "MyTranslationServiceName_String_Translation_Service".

name: StringTranslationService
comment:
Interface for providing string translating services.
 
 Implementations of this interface are usually done via a Plugin
 and then registered via Plugin's registerServiceProvided().
